website_summaries.verdict: If you have a larger pet, this is your best option.
pros: Though it lacks cushioning or sidewalls, this is a great heating mat for dogs, measuring 25.5 by 15.7 inches
The temperature can be set to 7 different levels, and the water resistant PVC cover is easily removable for cleaning
cons: A few customers felt that the heating pad does not get warm enough

customer_reviews.title: Just didn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: We tried this pad and it just didn't work. We followed instructions and had it placed in our cat's box but it just never achieved any heat. I understand it is supposed to warm up to the cat's body temperature but I tried it placing my hands across it for a length of time and it never achieved any kind of heat, even when temp set to maximum. I even tried bringing it in and laying my own leg across it for over half an hour but nothing happened. I'm going to have to find an alternative product, this was a disappointment and waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Mercury1

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a upcoming litter to prepare and I am a couple days past my return date at first use yesterday when they were born. Learned my lesson to test things out soon as they arrive from now on. Does not get warm no matter what temperature I set it at. Must be defective.
customer_reviews.author: S. Blades

customer_reviews.title: Burned
customer_reviews.text: I brought two of these and one of them burned. One if my dog moved it around and it was folded. This is the result.
customer_reviews.author: Martha S

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for Pet
customer_reviews.text: winter is coming so I wanted to give my dog a heating pad. It has a temperature controller so I dont need to worry if it's too hot or to cold for my pet. I chose blue color and it seems very comfy and neat. The most important thing is very safe. My dog likes it too.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew T.

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: we got this for the cats in the barn. they have a set up with a blanket on top and the heating pad underneath. they use this every night. I would definitely order this again and recommend it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Love the safety features and temperature control. We have 2 older dogs, and they love to lay on these. Wish the larger sizes were available through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wellmon

customer_reviews.title: Functional, good size for small and medium dog
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 15 year old dog. She's about 20 lbs and losing hair due to cushing disease. This pad works great . I set the temp to 75 degrees and she loves the comfort of heat against her body. I love to see her sleeping soundly on this heating pad.
customer_reviews.author: pacifichawk

customer_reviews.title: Ruined product
customer_reviews.text: This pad folded in on itself inside the liner and actually melted together. I cannot flatten it and attempt to do so ripped the plastic. I feel as though it is a fire hazard at this point. I only used it for a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Harang

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT be fooled
customer_reviews.text: Do not be fooled by the full size adult Golden Retriever laying on this tiny pad. WOW...That's on me. The plug and cord were weighty and pretty heavy duty but the pad itself was nothing more then the same stiff plastic-ie thing that you can get at Rite-Aid. If your dog doesn't tend to chew up electrical cords, don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Q.

customer_reviews.title: Not really a heating pad.
customer_reviews.text: It barely gets warm even on the highest setting. Its supposed to be suitable for outdoor use but the control box is not weatherproof.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bevilacqua

customer_reviews.title: Works great while it lasts
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my needs (and earned 5 stars fast), but quit working after 6-7 weeks of nightly use. I knew this wouldn't last forever, but 6 weeks seems a little ridiculous! I wouldn't recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Diana Novak

customer_reviews.title: It ok
customer_reviews.text: The highest setting is not very warm or warm enough for those very cold nights. But it's better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what you are expecting
customer_reviews.text: My dog did not like feel (hard plastic) or sound it made when he laid down on it. I even put it inside his bed covering & he still didn't like it.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Burn!!
customer_reviews.text: Melted together & started to burn a hole in the carrier it was placed in!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ament

customer_reviews.title: My dog won't lay on this
customer_reviews.text: The temperature was barely warm. My dog did not like the feel of the mat and would not lay on it.
customer_reviews.author: Allison B.

customer_reviews.title: Defective?
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I got a defective product or what, but the PETBROO Heating Pad doesn't get warm.
customer_reviews.author: ­­­­­­

customer_reviews.title: Indoor use only
customer_reviews.text: Advertising says it's an indoor or outdoor bed, but is for indoor use only.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Sandberg

customer_reviews.title: The dog and cat both love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product - nice workmanship on the details and works as advertised. I bought it for our 11-year old dog, but I regularly have to shoo the cat off to give him the chance.
customer_reviews.author: David B. Oberholtzer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my cat because it was getting cold and he loves it! It heats up very fast to the temperature that you set.
customer_reviews.author: jessica Huang 96

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS ITEM!! It does not work. Plugged in waited 15 mins still did not heat up.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Cooney

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Nice and easy to work but it was a little smaller than i thought.
customer_reviews.author: Keyautica

customer_reviews.title: Fails to maintain set temperature
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months of loving this and regular use by 2 cats who love it so much they agreed to share...it no longer maintains the heat I set and it jumps to 205. Very dissapointed. I liked it so much I got 2. They both fail to keep the setting
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Heating Pads for pets, 2018 Upgraded Electric Heating Pad for Dogs &Cats Warming Dog Beds Pet Mat Activated with Chew Resistant Cord Soft Removable Cover 25.5x15.7IN Blue
